content.scenario: Welcome to Hour 2: Recognizing and Responding to Human Trafficking. This important session will equip you with the knowledge to identify potential signs of trafficking and understand your role as a cosmetology professional.
content.connection: As a cosmetology professional, you have a unique position. Clients may confide in you, and you may observe warning signs that others miss. The chair of trust you create is more than comfortâ€”it can be a lifeline.
content.law: Texas law requires cosmetology professionals to complete training on recognizing and reporting human trafficking. This is mandated under HB 2059.
